tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I feel so fortunate to be patient of being Dr. Sunil Eshwar.We were finding randomly in practo for good gynac but found the best who gifted us the lifetime happiness. Happy to share that we are blessed with cute princessafter few failures due to my health issues.But he was thorough in his explanations and took his time answering my questions, often anticipating them. I was further impressed with his incredible professional responsiveness in terms of communication. He responded to messages and phone calls within the same day and always contacted me personally after lab results came in. These qualities alone would have set him apart from other doctors but Dr. Sunil went further. Unlike gynac at other medical institutions, he was proactive about addressing the various physiological conditions I had going on. He understood that every factor, however minor, is still a factor, and he dealt with each one head on. His expertise made me feel reassured, confident and taken care of. Medical institutions aren't always so in tune with individual needs. Patients are usually one of many and are treated as such. Dr. Sunil treats each patient as if they are the only one, and it is remarkable that he makes what could potentially be an impersonal institutional context more personal and thoughtful."For this Me and my family are very thankful to Dr. Sunil Eshwar and the entire staff of Aikya hospital ..The staff of Aikya Hospital were very patient, cooperative and supportive . Thanks to you guy

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ******** ****** *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** ****** ** ** ********* ******** I never had the hope of normal delivery with my sedentary lifestyle, but he gave an hope and made it possible with his right suggestions, positive talks and on time medications. I had consulted him for my 2 pregnancies in his clinic and had my normal delivery in Aster RV hospital.  My second pregnancy had ups and downs and had risk of delivering at 7th month but with his right suggestions and medications I could delay the delivery and had healthy baby born near to due date. I highly recommend Dr.Sunil Eshwar sir for all of those who is looking for good doctor. Thanks to Dr. Sunil Eshwar sir and team for providing a very good experience and service, and making this journey memorable

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: As his Name is Eshwar , ** ** **** ****** ***. Very calm , very friendly . Always very positive about everything. Always told my wife it will be normal delivery and always guided well throughout pregnancy till birth. Never a hint of irritation for asking too many questions always answered with smile. Dr Eshwar needs no recommendation his ethical values and calm nature makes name for himself. Not to forget his team which are always helpful and are critical part of your pregnancy journey. Thanks to his team and non medical staff as well who pick call any time during emergency as well. Had very pleasant experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sunil Eshwar is a godsend. . He was the second father who gave me life ***** ** ** **** **** *********** **** ***** He‚Äôs a very patient person who genuinely cares about his patients. He always takes the time to explain things to us in terms that we can understand. The entire staff is wonderful. We (me and my husband) would highly recommend Dr. Sunil Eshwar to anyone seeking a kind, compassionate, and brilliant doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Consulted Sunil sir during pre pregnancy and pregnancy.Being pregnant for the first time, I was very scared , Dr Sunil addressed all our queries throught out our journey of 9 months and was very supportive.

He is very approachable person, patient oriented and makes his patients feel positive despite of any issues.

We are blessed with a baby boy on 9th May 2021, we would like to Thank Sunil sir for the smooth delivery during covid crisis and highly recommend him for his knowledge and commitment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Sunil Eshwar, a humble doctor with his best experienced team makes sure you have a healthy, safe pregnancy and delivery.  
Me being a mother of Preterm baby, was worried about our second pregnancy. I was conceived and we reached Dr. Sunil sir, he made my entire pregnancy period smoother even though i had started getting contractions at 31st week. Dr. Sunil sir secured my pregnancy until 36 weeks which was miraculous in my condition. We are lucky to have such an experienced doctor. Thanks to his best team of doctors, we are blessed with healthy baby. 
Thank you "Dr. Sunil sir".

And not to forget, the Aikya Speciality Centre is not just a clinic, but a group of trusted and experienced staff with humanity.
Thanks to Rekha madam for her dedication and support.

review:
We are so grateful that we met Dr. Sunil. He is an amazing doctor as well as a human. I have major complications durning my pregnancy, but Sunil sir made it so smooth and because of him today we have bundle of joy in our lives... I can never thank enough for what you have give to us.
You were always available for us irrespective of situation and time. Right from the day I convinced till my delivery Sunil sit and his team was around me.
Sunil sir has an amazing team - Dr. Shivani, Dr. Smriti, Dr. Bhavana, Dr. Vineetha, Dr. Raksha, Dr. Bharti.
I highly recommend couples who are trying to conceive and wantbto have baby, to visit and meet Dr. Sunil... You will never regret and be very satisfied with the treatment and results..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Laparoscopic Surgery (Obs & Gyn),
review:
After I had an IUD in February 2018. We waited for a while and when we tried again to realise naturally conceiving was becoming a challenge. Upon relying on word of mouth from close sources, I contacted Dr. Sunil Eshwar. On the first consultation itself, there was a positive vibe (I'm not exaggerating) and no doubt he is so popular. He patiently listens to us, friendly talkative and can be tuff at times if you don't follow his advice rightfully. Glad to be treated by a doctor who is highly efficient and passionate about his work. After consultation and assessment for few months, he advised laproscopic surgery which truly made an impact and I conceived in just a couple of months. Truly grateful to him and his amazing team for giving ray of hope again. I'm counting weeks, maybe days, soon to be mom again:-) :-) 

Many thanks to Dr. Sunil Eshwar and his team: Dr. Shivani Chandan, Dr. Smriti Nayak and Mrs. Naseemus Saher (Department Co-ordinator).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ** *** **** ****** ** *** *** ***** A few years ago, I had read a review that he is the Eshwar of a particular patient's life. Well, I must say he is the Eshwar of my life too. He is extremely knowledgeable and highly experienced. I have visited him in his clinic and the hospitals. He fills his patients with optimism.I felt little or no pain during and after minor and major procedures. Many people (myself included üòÑ) found it hard to believe that I had undergone a cerclage and then delivered via a C section. His hands are that magical. Trust in him, take his medicines, keep up your appointments  and you are sure to have a wonderful journey of becoming a mother. He saved both my baby and me. God bless the doctor abundantly, always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Pregnancy care and management,
review:
I would be more happy to provide feedback here I know how much pain infertility is. It was 6 years I didn‚Äôt able to conceive but finally I got to know about Sir DR Sunil Eshwar really in first meet only got the confidence like am in safe hands n I will hav good news soon. 

He always talk with patients with smile and it makes us to forget about our pain n he examine patients history and suggest what is best option to go for it.His approach with medication little different n unique n it gives best result. 

I Strongly strongly recommend any couple who willing to hav baby pls consult doc DR Sunil Eshwar.
Finally we are going to be happy parents soon.

Thank you Doctor for all your support and care.
